title: How to Delete Comments from TikTok Videos: 4 Easy Ways

steps.title: Go to the video that contains the unwanted comment.
steps.content: Go to the video that contains the unwanted comment. Whether you want to delete a comment you left on someone else's video or a comment someone else left on your video , deleting a comment is easy. It's not possible to edit the comment--you can only delete it.

steps.title: Tap the Comment icon.
steps.content: Tap the Comment icon. It's the chat bubble on the right side of the video. This opens a list of all comments on the selected video.

steps.title: Press and hold the comment you want to delete.
steps.content: Press and hold the comment you want to delete. A menu with several options will expand. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This deletes the comment from the video. [2] X Research source If the comment violates TikTok's community guidelines, tap Report instead. You can then select a category, such as Bullying and harassment or Hateful behavior . If the comment is a violation, TikTok will remove the comment. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the video on your profile that contains comments you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the video on your profile that contains comments you want to delete. If one of your own videos contains multiple comments you want to remove, it's easy to delete them more than one comment at once. You can only delete multiple comments on your own TikToks, so make sure you're tapping a video on your own profile. While this method makes it easy to delete multiple comments, it won't be efficient if you want to delete all of the comments on a video with lots of comments. Instead, hide all comments for the video so they'll no longer be visible to anyone.

steps.title: Tap the Comment icon.
steps.content: Tap the Comment icon. It's the chat bubble on the right side of the video. This opens a list of all comments on the selected video. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the sliders or pencil icon.
steps.content: Tap the sliders or pencil icon. You'll see one of these two icons in the upper-right area of the comment list. Now you'll see empty circles to the left of each comment.

steps.title: Tap the circles next to each comment you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the circles next to each comment you want to delete. As you tap, a red-and-white checkmark will appear inside of each circle.

steps.title: Tap Delete at the bottom-left corner of the screen.
steps.content: Tap Delete at the bottom-left corner of the screen. A confirmation message will appear. [5] X Research source If all of the comments you've selected violate TikTok's community guidelines, tap More at the bottom-right corner and select Report comments instead. You can then select a category, such as Bullying and harassment or Hateful behavior . If the comment is a violation, TikTok will remove some or all of these comments.

steps.title: Tap Delete to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Delete to confirm. All of the selected comments are now removed from your video. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the video on your profile from which you want to remove comments.
steps.content: Tap the video on your profile from which you want to remove comments. If one of your own videos contains a lot of comments and you don't want to manually delete them, you can easily hide all comments on the video. You can unhide the comments later if you decide you're okay with them being visible.

steps.title: Tap the three dots or three lines on the video.
steps.content: Tap the three dots or three lines on the video. You'll see one of these two icons at the bottom-right corner of the video, depending on your platform.

steps.title: Tap Privacy settings.
steps.content: Tap Privacy settings . You may have to scroll down or swipe left to see this option.

steps.title: Tap the "Allow comments" switch to toggle the feature off.
steps.content: Tap the "Allow comments" switch to toggle the feature off. When the switch is off (gray or white), all existing comments on the video will disappear and new comments cannot be added. [7] X Research source You can return to this screen at any time to reenable comments, which brings the original comments back to the video. You can also disable comments when posting new videos. When posting your new video, just toggle off the "Allow comments" switch before posting.

steps.title: Tap the three-line icon at the top of your TikTok profile ☰.
steps.content: Tap the three-line icon at the top of your TikTok profile ☰ . If random people keep leaving you rude , offensive, or spammy comments, you can limit who can comment on your videos without making your account private. You can also create comment filters that instantly hide comments that contain spam, offensive language, or specific keywords until you approve them. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . You'll see this at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . It's the second option in the list.

steps.title: Tap Comments.
steps.content: Tap Comments . You'll see this under the "INTERACTIONS" heading near the middle of the page.

steps.title: Change who can comment on your posts.
steps.content: Change who can comment on your posts. By default, the Everyone option is selected—this means that anyone who comes across your TikTok videos can leave a comment. To keep strangers out of your comments, Followers that you follow back instead. Make sure to unfollow anyone you don't want to comment on your profile.

steps.title: Filter out comments containing spam, offensive content, and specific words.
steps.content: Filter out comments containing spam, offensive content, and specific words. You'll see two options under "Comment filters" that are disabled by default. Enabling one or both will help limit the number of comments you ultimately have to delete. [9] X Research source Tap the "Filter spam and offensive comments" switch to instantly hide all new comments that TikTok deems spammy or inappropriate. Tap the "Filter keywords" switch to instantly hide all comments that contain the keywords you add to your keyword list. If any of the words you add to the "Add keywords" field appear in a new comment, TikTok will hide the comment from everyone but you.

steps.title: Review filtered comments.
steps.content: Review filtered comments. If you enabled comment filters and receive new filtered comments, you can review and approve or delete those comments. Here's how: On your profile, tap the three lines at the top-right and select Settings and privacy . Tap Privacy and select Comments . Tap Review filtered comments . Tap Approve to unhide a filtered comment, or Delete to delete it permanently.
